name: Iva Somnia
description:
CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys - Movement

Esc, X - Cancel, Go Back, Menu

Enter, Space, Z - Ok, Interact

Note: Some items have special abilities, so use them as needed.

SUMMARY:

Iva Somnia is a short horror game which relies on exploration for storytelling. There isn't a main storyline or much dialogue, so players may have different interpretations on its meaning. Players will have to explore the world in order to reach its ending.

Available for Windows and Mac. You can also play the browser version of the game.

DEVELOPER:

Raffy's Playground -> Twitter - Youtube
